scripts.build: npm run lint && rm -rf build && packageName=$(npm pack) && tar -xvzf $packageName && mv package build && rm $packageName && cd build && npm i --production && rm -f package-lock.json && cd ..
scripts.cf_package: npm run updateAlarms && npm run build && aws cloudformation package --template-file app-sam.json --s3-bucket $S3_BUCKET --output-template-file app-output_sam.yaml
scripts.cf_deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file app-output_sam.yaml --stack-name $npm_package_name --region eu-west-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-override UnencryptedHookUrl="https://hooks.slack.com/services/whatever/whatever" SlackChannel="#my-channel" OrgName="localistars - inweso GmbH"
scripts.deploy: npm run cf_package && npm run cf_deploy
